The patient was brought to the operating room and placed in the supine position
After general mask anesthesia was adequately obtaine

text: external auditory canal was cleaned out under the microscope
context: After general mask anesthesia was adequately obtained, the right external auditory canal was cleaned out under the microscope.

text: Serous fluid was aspirated from the middle ear space
context: Serous fluid was aspirated from the middle ear space
An Armstrong grommet tube was placed down through the incision and rotated into place
Cortisporin suspension was placed in both ear canals
Then the patient was intubated.

text: mouth gag was placed into the mouth
context: A Crowe-Davis mouth gag was placed into the mouth and extended and hung on the Mayo stand.
The adenoid fossa was visualized with the mirror.

text: adenoids were removed using the microdebrider
context: The adenoids were removed using the microdebrider.
Two adenoid packs were placed.
The packs were removed one by one.
Using mirror and suction bovie, adequate hemostasis was achieved.

text: tonsils were quite large and cryptic
context: The tonsils were quite large and cryptic.
Cheesy material came out from the crypts
The bovie electrocautery was used to make an incision in the right anterior tonsillar pillar,
The tonsil was completely dissected out of this plane, preserving both the anterior and posterior tonsillar pillars.
All bleeders were cauterized as they were encountered.
Both tonsil beds were then re-cauterized, paying particular attention to the inferior and superior poles.

text: The stomach was evacuated with the nasogastric tube
context: The stomach was evacuated with the nasogastric tube.
The patient was then awakened in the operating room, extubated and taken to the recovery room in satisfactory condition.
